description: This requirement is only open to the below list of pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS).
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Project Title:** Senior Business Process Consultant Services

**Reference Number:** W8485-TSPS2024-02/A

**Publication Date:** June 13, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** July 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Vendor Request:** This announcement invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of Senior Business Process Consultant services to the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Services Required:**

- Senior Business Process Consultant services to support Director Aerospace Equipment Business (DAEBM) and its Sustainment Centre of Expertise Air (CoE Air) activities.
- The consultant will provide expertise in business consulting and change management services.

**Project Duration:**

The contract shall be for a period of two (2) years, with three (3) irrevocable option years, allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

**Security Requirements:**

- Vendor security clearance: FSC - Secret
- Document safeguarding: None

**Estimated Level of Effort:**

- 230 days per year

**Location of Work:**

- National Capital Region, 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC

**Request for Proposal Documents:**

- Available upon request by email to the DND Point of Contact (DND POC) listed below.
- Bidders are advised that RFP documents will be emailed directly to the pre-qualified suppliers.

**List of Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**

The following list of suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:
- 113 suppliers from the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) pre-qualified suppliers under E60ZT-18TSPS, who are being tier 1 suppliers for the Business Process Consultant category.

**Contact Information:**

- Department of National Defence, Tony Seng, (819) 939-4148, Tony.Seng@forces.gc.ca

**Trade Agreements:**

- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
...
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

Please refer to the full tender document (W8485-TSPS2024-02)_RFPSeniorBusinessProcessConsultant.pdf) available on the authorized webpage https://canadabuys.canada
